description: Detects suspicious child processes of the SQLServer process. This could indicate potential RCE or SQL Injection.
author: FPT.EagleEye Team
wagga
name: Suspicious Child Process Of SQL Server
query: ((process.parent.executable.text:"*\\sqlservr.exe" AND process.executable.text:("*\\bash.exe" OR "*\\bitsadmin.exe" OR "*\\cmd.exe" OR "*\\netstat.exe" OR "*\\nltest.exe" OR "*\\ping.exe" OR "*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe" OR "*\\regsvr32.exe" OR "*\\rundll32.exe" OR "*\\sh.exe" OR "*\\systeminfo.exe" OR "*\\tasklist.exe" OR "*\\wsl.exe")) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable.text:"C\:\\Program\ Files\\Microsoft\ SQL\ Server\\*" AND process.parent.executable.text:"*DATEV_DBENGINE\\MSSQL\\Binn\\sqlservr.exe" AND process.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe" AND process.command_line.text:"\"C\:\\Windows\\system32\\cmd.exe\"\ *")))
